price: 27. « Ce Messager qui vous est envoyé, fit (Pharaon), est vraiment possédé ! »
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ ٱلَّذِيٓ أُرۡسِلَ إِلَيۡكُمۡ لَمَجۡنُونٞ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna rasūlakumu alladhī ur'sila ilaykum lamajnūnun
